巁字的基本解释

巁
lì
（山）高。

巁
liè
姓。

巁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》力制切，去祭，來。］
崔巍。
[②]［liè］
［《集韻》力蘖切，入薛，來。］
(1)山高貌。
(2)姓氏用字。

巁字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巁； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页322第02
【廣韻】【集韻】?力制切，音厲。【說文】巍高也。本作?。通作巁。　又【集韻】力蘖切，音列。山高貌。又古有巁山氏。

巁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
巁字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" force cutting, go to sacrifice, come. ]
Cui Wei.
[②]［liè］
["Ji Yun" force tiller cut, enter Xue, come. ]
(1) The appearance of the mountain.
(2) Use words for surnames.
巁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　巁; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 322 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Forced cutting, sharp sound. [Said the text] Wei Gao also. This work?. Pass for 巁.　[Jiyun] forcefully cut, phonetic sequence. High mountain appearance. In ancient times, there was the Kunshan clan.
